mapper.sql: select A.id AS id, A.name AS name, A.companyTypeId AS companyTypeId, F.name AS companyTypeName, A.memberType AS memberType, E.name AS memberTypeName, A.level AS level, A.countryId AS countryId, B.name AS countryName, A.provinceId AS provinceId, C.name AS provinceName, A.cityId AS cityId, D.name AS cityName, A.address AS address, A.creditCode AS creditCode, A.cerificateAttachment1 AS cerificateAttachment1, A.cerificateAttachment2 AS cerificateAttachment2, A.email AS email, A.phone AS phone, A.adminAccountId AS adminAccountId, A.status AS status, A.isSendBl AS isSendBl, A.isReceive AS isReceive, A.isEnableSeal AS isEnableSeal, A.createDate AS createDate, A.createUserId As createUserId, A.createUserName AS createUserName, A.modifyDate AS modifyDate, A.modifyUserId AS modifyUserId, A.modifyUserName AS modifyUserName, A.isDel AS isDel, A.version AS version from company A LEFT JOIN address B ON A.countryId = B.id LEFT JOIN address C ON A.provinceId = C.id LEFT JOIN address D ON A.cityId = D.id LEFT JOIN membertype E ON A.memberType = E.id LEFT JOIN companytype F ON A.companyTypeId = F.id

SELECT A.id AS id, A.name AS name, A.companyTypeId AS companyTypeId, F.NAME AS companyTypeName, A.memberType AS memberType, E.NAME AS memberTypeName, A.LEVEL AS LEVEL, A.countryId AS countryId, B.NAME AS countryName, A.provinceId AS provinceId, C.NAME AS provinceName, A.cityId AS cityId, D.NAME AS cityName, A.address AS address, A.creditCode AS creditCode, A.cerificateAttachment1 AS cerificateAttachment1, A.cerificateAttachment2 AS cerificateAttachment2, A.email AS email, A.phone AS phone, A.adminAccountId AS adminAccountId, A.status AS status, A.isSendBl AS isSendBl, A.isReceive AS isReceive, A.isEnableSeal AS isEnableSeal, A.createDate AS createDate, A.createUserId AS createUserId, A.createUserName AS createUserName, A.modifyDate AS modifyDate, A.modifyUserId AS modifyUserId, A.modifyUserName AS modifyUserName, A.isDel AS isDel, A.version AS version, G.file AS file, H.file AS Sealfile, H.isEnable AS isEnable, H.sealType AS sealType, ( SELECT H.file FROM seal H RIGHT JOIN company A ON A.id = H.companyId WHERE H.isEnable = 1 AND H.sealType = 1 AND H.companyId=#{id}) AS Sealfile1, ( SELECT H.file FROM seal H RIGHT JOIN company A ON A.id = H.companyId WHERE H.isEnable = 1 AND H.sealType = 2 AND H.companyId=#{id}) AS Sealfile2 FROM company A LEFT JOIN address B ON A.countryId = B.id LEFT JOIN address C ON A.provinceId = C.id LEFT JOIN address D ON A.cityId = D.id LEFT JOIN membertype E ON A.memberType = E.id LEFT JOIN companytype F ON A.companyTypeId = F.id LEFT JOIN bllogo G ON A.id = G.companyId LEFT JOIN seal H ON A.id = H.companyId

SELECT A.id AS id, A.name AS name, A.companyTypeId AS companyTypeId, F.name AS companyTypeName, A.memberType AS memberType, E.name AS memberTypeName, A.level AS level, A.countryId AS countryId, B.name AS countryName, A.provinceId AS provinceId, C.name AS provinceName, A.cityId AS cityId, D.name AS cityName, A.address AS address, A.creditCode AS creditCode, A.cerificateAttachment1 AS cerificateAttachment1, A.cerificateAttachment2 AS cerificateAttachment2, A.email AS email, A.phone AS phone, A.adminAccountId AS adminAccountId, CASE A.status WHEN '1' THEN '待审核' WHEN '2' THEN '未通过' WHEN '9' THEN '通过' ELSE '其它' END status, CASE A.isSendBl WHEN '1' THEN '通过' WHEN '2' THEN '未通过' ELSE '其它' END isSendBl, CASE A.isReceive WHEN '1' THEN '通过' WHEN '2' THEN '未通过' ELSE '其它' END isReceive, CASE A.isEnableSeal WHEN '1' THEN '通过' WHEN '2' THEN '未通过' ELSE '其它' END isEnableSeal, A.createDate AS createDate, A.createUserId As createUserId, A.createUserName AS createUserName, A.modifyDate AS modifyDate, A.modifyUserId AS modifyUserId, A.modifyUserName AS modifyUserName, A.isDel AS isDel, A.version AS version from company A LEFT JOIN address B ON A.countryId = B.id LEFT JOIN address C ON A.provinceId = C.id LEFT JOIN address D ON A.cityId = D.id LEFT JOIN membertype E ON A.memberType = E.id LEFT JOIN companytype F ON A.companyTypeId = F.id
